reviewText: This was a gift! He really enjoyed the whole dvd and the boxing scenes were Awesome on all the Great Power Shots!  Thank you

This DVD is worth it for the Jones VS. Toney footage (exclusive to this DVD) alone (note that I picked this up at Wal-Mart/Sams for $9.40)!

  My only problems with this DVD are that: (1) it shares a lot of it's footage with "Roy Jones Jr.'s Greatest Knockouts" and (2) that we don't get to see the couple times he really tagged John Ruiz (the victim on the cover).

  Whining aside- any fan of fight sports needs to see Roy Jones' power -preserved here and ready for your viewing at the touch of a button.

  Mike Tyson's power turned out peoples lights, Foreman's hammered people; when Roy Jones hits people just right it looks like they've been thrown from a moving vehicle.

  Buy this.  Make your friends watch it.  Trust me.
I BOUGHT THIS ONE FOR MY DAD IN CALIFORNIA.
if you to see boxing at its finest nothing can compare to this gifted boxer love it excellent amust have
My favorite Boxer! Shows great powershots, slow's them down so you can see how devastating the punch really was! Awesome!

I ENJOYED EVERY MINUTE OF THIS DVD WITH ROY JONES JR. SHOWING HIS POWERFUL SHOTS. IT BROUGHT BACK SO MANY MEMORIES. YOU ALL KNOW THAT ROY JONES JR IS MY FAVORITE BOXER OF ALL TIMES. I JUST LOVE HIM. THIS IS A KEEPER AND A MUST HAVE. I AM NOT EVEN GOING TO LET ANYONE BORROW THIS. GET YOUR OWN. IT IS SO HOT!

LOVE,
ALMARINE THE REDEEMED
